data.what_is:
Xpressdocs is the ultimate one-stop marketing shop. Our core mission is to help you control your brand from customization and production all the way through to the distribution of your marketing materials. We provide solutions that streamline processes, automate tasks, and empower a distributed workforce. 

As a trusted marketing solutions provider, Xpressdocs helps Franchisors and Franchisees deliver an unbeatable selection of high-quality print, promotional, and digital products, from brand-approved direct mail and stationery to banners and YETI tumblers. Our optional approval dashboards and online ordering system place the power of effective marketing within your grasp, and our dedicated 5-star client services team is available to make your marketing efforts a simple, stress-free process.
data.product_description:
Xpressdocs is the ultimate one-stop marketing shop. Our core mission is to help you control your brand from customization and production all the way through to the distribution of your marketing materials. We provide solutions that streamline processes, automate tasks, and empower a distributed workforce. 

As a trusted marketing solutions provider, Xpressdocs helps Franchisors and Franchisees deliver an unbeatable selection of high-quality print, promotional, and digital products, from brand-approved direct mail and stationery to banners and YETI tumblers. Our optional approval dashboards and online ordering system place the power of effective marketing within your grasp, and our dedicated 5-star client services team is available to make your marketing efforts a simple, stress-free process.

initial_reviews.review_title: A great way to manage the marketing process
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xpressdocs?
Same day shipping for most orders and attention to detail and quality is high.

What do you dislike about Xpressdocs?
Website platform is not the easiest for searching for what you need right away.

What problems is Xpressdocs solving and how is that benefiting you?
Great for creating and delivering direct mail pieces for various campaigns throughout the year.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Xpressdocs?
review_question_answers.answer: Same day shipping for most orders and attention to detail and quality is high.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Xpressdocs?
review_question_answers.answer: Website platform is not the easiest for searching for what you need right away.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Xpressdocs solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Great for creating and delivering direct mail pieces for various campaigns throughout the year.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xpressdocs?
Easy ordering, quality prints, affordable pricing, and they handle the postage! Their customer service has been helpful when needed.

What do you dislike about Xpressdocs?
Their website is a little glitchy and clunky, but I don't mind it.

What problems is Xpressdocs solving and how is that benefiting you?
I used to use a print shop and sort bulk mail by hand. Xpressdocs does it all for me, quickly and affordably.

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent Software for Automation of Brand Management
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Xpressdocs?
Interface, Automated email, Branding Efforts Automation,

What do you dislike about Xpressdocs?
Nothing as such. However, sometimes it hangs and might lead to loss of unsaved changes

What problems is Xpressdocs solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated the process of Brand Intelligence and insights into Marketing intelligence which are backed by historical data
